A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just awful\, and I don't think that because I'm not a \"true Star Wars fan\" this is coming from someone who bought every episode 3 LEGO set\, has just about every Star Wars video game\, and knows the answer to every Star Wars trivial pursuit question. It's an insult to the viewer and the franchise\, watch it for FREE and be the judge yourself but don't pay for it or you'll only encourage more of this crap.
